summary: Frontend testing completed for P0/P1/P2 features: New screens (FAQs, Edit Profile, Habits Tracker, Google Drive Backup) and integrations (SecurityInfoModal, StreakCalendar). All 16 features tested and verified working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: SecurityInfoModal component properly implements overlay with 6 security features and Got It close button
StreakCalendar component correctly shows weekly/monthly toggle with logged dates tracking
Edit Profile screen has working currency selector with 5 currencies (INR, USD, EUR, GBP, JPY)
Habits Tracker implements proper +/- counters with quick add buttons for steps, water, mindful minutes
FAQs screen has 16 questions across 5 categories with expandable items
Google Drive backup correctly shows mocked state since it requires native modules
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new P0/P1/P2 screens tested. SecurityInfoModal opens from SECURE badge on home screen. Settings has working navigation to all 6 new screens. Habits Tracker counters work correctly. Google Sign-In is mocked (requires development build).

mocked_apis.Google Sign-In: Google Drive Sign-In is MOCKED since it requires native modules not available in Expo Go/web preview. Shows info banner explaining this limitation.
